Test Scenarios: Allowed to submit empty contact form
Test Step:
1. Navigate to DemoBlaze website
2. Click on Contact menu
3. On Contact modal, leave Contact Email, Contact Name, and Message input fields empty and click button
4. Verify dialog box message and accept

1. Navigate to DemoBlaze website
2. Click on Contact menu
3. On Contact modal, enter value on Contact Email, Contact Name, and Message input fields and click button
4. Verify dialog box message and accept

1. Navigate to DemoBlaze website
2. Click on Sign up menu
3. On Sign up modal, leave Username and Password input fields empty and click button
4. Verify dialog box message and accept

1. Navigate to DemoBlaze website
2. Click on Sign up menu
3. On Sign up modal, enter value on Username and Password input fields and click button
4. Verify dialog box message and accept

1. Navigate to DemoBlaze website
2. Click on Log in menu
3. On Log in modal, leave Username and Password input fields empty and click button
4. Verify dialog box message and accept

1. Navigate to DemoBlaze website
2. Click on Log in menu
3. On Log in modal, enter incorrect Username and valid Password and click button
4. Verify dialog box message and accept

1. Navigate to DemoBlaze website
2. Click on Log in menu
3. On Log in modal, enter correct Username and incorrect Password and click button
4. Verify dialog box message and accept

Test Scenarios: Login with correct username and password
Test Step:
1. Navigate to DemoBlaze website
2. Click on Log in menu
3. On Log in modal, enter correct Username and Password and click button
4. Verify dialog box message and accept

Test Scenarios: View and navigate pages: Phone category
Test Step:
1. Navigate to DemoBlaze website
2. Click on Home menu
3. Click on Phones menu
4. Verify products listed
5. Navigate by clicking button and verify products listed
6. Navigate by clicking button and verify products listed
7. Click on any phone model listed
8. Once product details page displayed, click on button
9. Navigate to menu and verify product listed under table
